contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 1882 D Matlock Contest
Matlock Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
matlock-contest
None
Old English Hotel, Matlock Bridge The general opinion was that the playing of the Sutton band far surpassed any of the others. The judge said he never in his experience had heard a more perfect euphonium solo.
Prizes: £15, £10, £6, £4
Dec. 20, 2011, 12:51 p.m. Oct. 31, 2017, 8:17 a.m.
